translation.en: Aren't you a little old to be playing with dolls, Michael?
translation.es: ¿No estás viejo para jugar con muñecos, Michael?

translation.en: What do you think, Billy? Is my kid gonna love this thing, or what?
translation.es: ¿Crees que le gustará esto a mi hijo?

translation.en: Sure, he'll love it. He looks just like it.
translation.es: Claro, le encantará. Es parecido a ti.

translation.en: Yeah, he is pretty cute, isn't he?
Do you know what day it is?
Tuesday.
It's October 1st.
It was exactly ten years ago till I first came to America.
translation.es: Hace exactamente diez años desde que vine por primera vez a EE.UU.

translation.en: No shit.
Hey, happy anniversary, Billy.
I'll tell you what. Ten years deserves a celebration.
How about I take you out for a drink after work? Come on.
translation.es: ¿Te invito un trago a la salida, sí?

translation.en: I can't be too late, I'm meeting a girl at nine.
translation.es: No puedo demorarme. Tengo una cita a las 9h.

translation.en: She wants to help me celebrate, too.
If you could party after the graveyard shift. You got a lot of stamina.
translation.es: Si puedes festejar luego del turno de la noche, debes tener un montón de energía.

translation.en: You know what I mean?
Shit. Look like the fucking Indians got another one.
translation.es: Mierda, parece que los putos Indios robaron a otro.

translation.en: We better check it out, Billy.
translation.es: Es mejor que vayamos a ver.

translation.en: This is car 17 to dispatch.
We got a Code 10- 22.
Stripped truck, Sector H, right off Longfellow Avenue.
translation.es: Tenemos un 1022, camión desguazado. Sector H, pegado a Av. Longfellow.

translation.en: We'll get right back to you.
Careful, Billy.
Michael, check it out.
Jesus!
Christ, don't... don't shoot me.
Take anything you want, just don't shoot me.
translation.es: Llévense lo que quieran, pero no disparen.

translation.en: Relax.
We're cops, okay?
You fellas got one hell of a friendly city here, you know that?
translation.es: Qué flor de amigable la ciudad de ustedes, ¿lo sabían?

translation.en: Just stopped for a red light and boom.
translation.es: Solo me detuve por el semáforo y...

translation.en: Oh, they got my computers!
Oh, look at my rig!
My poor rig!
You stopped at a red light in the South Bronx with a truckload of computers?
translation.es: ¿Usted paró en un semáforo justo aquí cargado de computadoras?

translation.en: Where you from, pal? Texas.
Figures.
Welcome to New York.
Hey. You're not taking that in, are you?
Can't leave it in the car, someone will steal it. Don't give me a hard time. Get in there.
translation.es: En el auto me pueden robar. No me fastidies, métete ahí.

translation.en: Hey, that's enough, huh?
Come on, let's go! Let's do it!
Okay, I'm going to kick some fucking ass!
I'm gonna hit the can.
Another round for my two friends.
You got it.
All right, big man. Close that door!
- - Nobody move! - Michael, get the back door! - Okay!
translation.es: ¡Que nadie se mueva! Michael, ve a la puerta de atrás.

translation.en: All right, everybody over here. Get over to that jukebox!
translation.es: Muy bien, todos por aquí, sobre la rocola.

translation.en: Let's go! Move! Move!
All right. I wanna see rings, watches, wallets.
translation.es: Muy bien, quiero ver los anillos, relojes, billeteras.

translation.en: Let's go! You, get over there!
Hurry up! Hurry up!
Hey, that means you, too, bozo! Let's go!
translation.es: Y eso va para ti también, payaso, vamos.

translation.en: Come on! I said right now!
Hey, open that register real quick.
- Before I blow your fucking head off! -
translation.es: Antes de que te vuele la cabeza.

translation.en: - Take it easy. I'll open it. - Hey, bozo. Hurry up!
I want it!
Hey, man, it's not mine.
It's not mine.
Come on, boy. You're coming with me.
All right, big man.
Hey! What are you looking at?
I'll be out in a minute.
Oh, man. You shouldn't have done that.
translation.es: No deberías haber hecho eso, amigo.

translation.en: Frank, go around Mike.
- Duck, Billy! -
Michael. Michael.
Get those fuckers, Billy.
translation.es: Atrapa a esos hijos de puta.

translation.en: Get 'em.
Call 911, get an ambulance.
- Now! - Yeah, sure.
Hey, get off my car, you scumbag!
- Freeze! - What the hell?
You got five seconds to get off that fucking boat.
translation.es: Bájate pronto de esa puta lancha.

translation.en: Move!
Undo that line.
Come on, we got you.
l need your fastest boat.
Who the hell are you? Police, give me the keys.
Get the hell out of here, what are you doing?
Give me the fucking keys.
- Where's the boat? - Manhattan Express, right over there.
Hold it! Get the hell out of that thing.
translation.es: ¡Alto ahí! Sal de esa cosa, carajo.

translation.en: The Harbor Police will get him.
He killed Michael, Captain.
- Billy, I'm ordering you! -
Damn! Fucking Chinaman don't give up!
Aviation 0- 5- Zebra. Officer 1412 in pursuit of a suspect.
I'm in the blue- white speedboat below you. Can you come up over me?
translation.es: Estoy en la lancha azul y blanca debajo suyo, ¿puede venir por encima?

translation.en: Roger, 1412. New York control, this is 0- 5- Zebra in pursuit.
translation.es: Comprendido 1412. Control, aquí habla 05Z en persecución.

translation.en: We're turning south at the Brooklyn Bridge, heading down the river.
translation.es: Estamos doblando al sur del Puente de Brooklyn, hacia al río.

translation.en: That guy is crazy.
Come in closer and drop me a line.
On the count of three, pull me up as fast as you can.
translation.es: A la cuenta de tres, súbeme tan rápido como pueda.

translation.en: One, two, three!
Motherfucker!
Is Daddy coming back soon?
You deliberately disobeyed a direct order!
translation.es: Usted deliberadamente desobedeció a una orden directa.

translation.en: That man killed my partner.
That's no excuse for blowing up half the goddamn harbor!
translation.es: ¡No es excusa para volar a casi todo el maldito puerto!

translation.en: - Captain, listen. - You listen to me, Wong!
I don't like it any more than you do when a cop gets killed.
translation.es: Tampoco me gusta cuando matan a un policía.

translation.en: But we're not in the revenge business.
The Mayor's been up the commissioner's ass over this one, Wong. He wants your fucking shield!
translation.es: El alcalde habló con el comisario y él pidió su insignia.

translation.en: And if he can't get it, he'll take mine!
translation.es: Se no la doy, me quitará la mía.

translation.en: l had no choice, Captain. You could have stood by
and let the Harbor Police pick that guy up.
translation.es: Y que la Policía Portuaria lo atrapara.

translation.en: But, no, gotta be a big hero.
translation.es: Pero, no, tenías que ser el gran héroe.

translation.en: Billy Wong, Super Cop.
This is it, Billy. You're back to crowd control.
translation.es: Se terminó, Billy. Vuelves a Control de Multitudes.

translation.en: - But, Captain-- - No fucking buts!
That's final!
Maybe next time you'll think twice before you pull one of your hot dog stunts.
translation.es: De la próxima vez, piensa antes de salir con tus acrobacias.

translation.en: Now get out of here!
Nice suit, Garoni.
Billy, you like it, huh? I'm supposed to blend in with the crowd.
translation.es: Billy, te gusta, ¿eh? Debería ayudarme a mezclarme con la gente.

translation.en: I heard about your fireworks display in the harbor.
translation.es: Supe lo de tu espectáculo allá en el puerto.

translation.en: You always did have a flair for the dramatic, Billy boy.
translation.es: Siempre tuviste un gusto por lo dramático.

translation.en: How did you get this shit detail?
The usual. Some punk pulled a knife on me so I kicked his fucking teeth in.
translation.es: Lo de siempre, me amenazó con un cuchillo y le bajé los dientes.

translation.en: And he screamed, Police brutality!
All the way to the commissioner's office.
The usual bullshit. The usual bullshit.
translation.es: -La mierda de costumbre. -La mierda de costumbre.

translation.en: You know, if somebody dropped a bomb in here, they'd wipe out half the junior diplomats in New York.
translation.es: Si arrojan una bomba aquí, matarían la mitad de los diplomáticos de la ciudad.

translation.en: That's why we're here.
- Terrific, I'm glad you made it. - That's Laura Shapiro.
- It's lovely to see you. - Oh, I'd like to work undercover with her.
translation.es: Me gustaría trabajar disfrazado con ella.

translation.en: No, don't tell me.
You guys are cops?
We're that obvious?
You're not so bad, but, uh, that friend of yours,
translation.es: Tú no estás tan mal, pero ese amigo tuyo, es como un sapo de otro pozo.

translation.en: he sticks out like a sore thumb.
translation.es: pero ese amigo tuyo, es como un sapo de otro pozo.

translation.en: Look, uh, you guys allowed to drink? Can I get you a beer or something?
translation.es: ¿A ustedes se les permite beber? ¿Puedo traerles una cerveza?

translation.en: No, thanks. Tell you what.
translation.es: No, gracias. Si me esperas hasta que termine mi turno, te pago una copa.

translation.en: If you wait until I go off duty, I'll buy you a drink.
translation.es: Si me esperas hasta que termine mi turno, te pago una copa.

translation.en: Oh, yeah?
l just might take you up on that.
Um, excuse me, gentlemen. I have to mingle.
translation.es: Con permiso, señores. Tengo que socializarme.

translation.en: That bum, Shapiro, probably uses his own daughter to launder money.
translation.es: Seguro que ese vago de Shapiro usa a su hija para lavar dinero.

translation.en: Listen, you lousy Chink bastard, you keep bugging Mr. Shapiro's daughter,
translation.es: Mira, maldito chino de mierda, tendrán que quitarte del piso con una espátula, si la sigues molestando.

translation.en: they'll scrape you off the floor with a putty knife.
translation.es: tendrán que quitarte del piso con una espátula, si la sigues molestando.

translation.en: His name's Benny Garucci. He's an ex- karate champ.
translation.es: Se llama Benny Garucci, excampeón de carate.

translation.en: I would like to bust his fucking head open with a crowbar.
translation.es: Quería romperle la cabeza con una barra de hierro.

translation.en: But you're gonna have to hold him. He's a tough son of a bitch.
translation.es: Pero tendrías que sujetarlo, es muy bruto.

translation.en: I wonder why Shapiro needs that kind of muscle here?
translation.es: ¿Por qué Shapiro necesita esa clase de guardia?

translation.en: Are you kidding? He can afford to have the whole fucking Marine Corps
translation.es: ¿Estás bromeando? Él puede pagar al ejército

translation.en: standing by to protect him if he wanted to.
translation.es: para que lo protejan, si eso quisiera.

translation.en: That fuck owns half of Manhattan, Billy.
translation.es: Ese puto es dueño de medio Manhattan, Billy.

translation.en: l wouldn't mind teaching Garucci a little lesson in manners someday.
translation.es: No me molestaría en enseñarle una pequeña lección algún día.

translation.en: Ladies and gentlemen,
Laura Shapiro Marketing is very pleased to introduce to New York City
translation.es: la mercadotecnia de Laura Shapiro se complace en presentar a Nueva York,

translation.en: the sensational Edmond Wong
and his fabulous collection of shimmering cocktail wear.
translation.es: y su fabulosa colección, la flamante línea para cócteles.

translation.en: Nice dress. Nice tits.
The whole warehouse!
No! No! No!
No!
New York's finest.
Can't even keep a girl from being snatched right out from under your goddamn noses.
translation.es: Deberían estar listos para evitar que la llevaran.

translation.en: We had our guns out. You could've had your dicks out for all the good it did.
If I take my dick out, I'm gonna use it, Captain.
translation.es: ¿Para qué si no los puedo usar, capitán?

translation.en: We couldn't shoot without hitting the girl.
translation.es: Si disparáramos le daríamos a la chica.

translation.en: I think you two men did the right thing.
translation.es: Creo que ustedes hicieron lo correcto.

translation.en: Well, thank you, sir. Any word from Shapiro?
translation.es: Gracias, señor. ¿Se sabe algo de Shapiro?

translation.en: He has no idea why his daughter was snatched.
translation.es: No tiene idea de por qué secuestraron a su hija.

translation.en: We've been monitoring his phone for the past 12 hours.
translation.es: Estuvimos monitoreando su teléfono las últimas 12 horas.

translation.en: No ransom demands, no orders, nothing.
translation.es: No hay pedido de rescate, ni órdenes, nada.

translation.en: You might find this interesting.  What is it?
A record of all the phone calls made in the last 12 hours by Shapiro's hood,
translation.es: Un registro de las llamadas de las últimas 12 horas hechas por Benny Garucci.

translation.en: Benny Garucci.
Six calls all to the same number.
Country code 8- 5- 2.
- Hong Kong. - How the hell did you get this?
A friend of mine at the phone company.
translation.es: -Una amiga en la Cia. de teléfonos. -¿La rubia?

translation.en: - The blonde? - No, the redhead.
translation.es: -Una amiga en la Cia. de teléfonos. -¿La rubia? -No, la pelirroja. -¿Qué esto tiene que ver con Hong Kong?

translation.en: What the hell does all this got to do with Hong Kong?
translation.es: -No, la pelirroja. -¿Qué esto tiene que ver con Hong Kong?

translation.en: There's somebody waiting outside who might just be able to answer that.
translation.es: Afuera hay alguien que podría responder a eso.

translation.en: Send in Mr. Cantrell, please.
translation.es: Que entre el Sr. Cantrell, por favor.

translation.en: Men, this is Bob Cantrell from the Justice Department.
translation.es: Señores, les presento a Bob Cantrell, del Departamento de Justicia.

translation.en: Are these the men who kidnapped Laura Shapiro?
translation.es: ¿Fueron estos que llevaron a Laura Shapiro?

translation.en: Now, how the fuck should we know? They were wearing masks.
translation.es: ¿Cómo podremos saber? Usaban máscaras. Discúlpeme, señora.

translation.en: Excuse me, lady.
What's this all about?
These men all work for a powerful Hong Kong crime boss named Harold Ko.
translation.es: Todos ellos trabajan para un poderoso jefe mafioso, de Hong Kong, Harold Ko.

translation.en: Harold Ko.
What, do you know him?
Anybody who knows Hong Kong knows Ko.
translation.es: Quien conoce a Hong Kong, conoce a Ko.

translation.en: A real snake.
Yeah, and a tough one to catch.
translation.es: Sí, y una difícil de atrapar.

translation.en: Now, we've suspected Shapiro and Ko
translation.es: Sospechábamos que por años Shapiro y Ko,

translation.en: of running drugs from Hong Kong to New York for years, but we've never been able to pin anything on him.
translation.es: traen drogas de Hong Kong hasta acá, pero nunca fuimos capaces de achacarle.

translation.en: Why the hell would Ko wanna snatch Shapiro's daughter?
translation.es: ¿Y por qué Ko secuestraría a su hija?

translation.en: We don't know, maybe they've had a falling out of some kind.
translation.es: No lo sabemos, tal vez tuvieron alguna pelea.

translation.en: Whatever the reason,
translation.es: Cualquiera sea la razón, hay una buena posibilidad,

translation.en: there's a good possibility that Laura Shapiro
translation.es: Cualquiera sea la razón, hay una buena posibilidad, de que ella esté rehén en Hong Kong.

translation.en: is now being held in Hong Kong.
translation.es: de que ella esté rehén en Hong Kong.

translation.en: That's impossible. Nobody could smuggle a girl into Hong Kong that quickly.
translation.es: Imposible, nadie puede llevar tan rápido a una chica a Hong Kong.

translation.en: - It's impossible. - Not for Ko.
translation.es: Imposible, nadie puede llevar tan rápido a una chica a Hong Kong. -No para Ko. -Tiene razón.

translation.en: He's right.
Ko's got most of the island in his back pocket.
translation.es: Tiene a casi toda la isla en el bolsillo.

translation.en: Sir, if Laura Shapiro's in Hong Kong we should check it out.
translation.es: Señor, si ella está en Hong Kong deberíamos ir a ver.

translation.en: Forget it, Wong.
My Chinatown contacts can give me the names of some good informers over there.
translation.es: Mis contactos en el Barrio Chino, pueden indicarme a informantes allá.

translation.en: It might be worth our try.
Garoni could come with me. He knows Hong Kong from his Vietnam days.
translation.es: Garoni puede venir, ya conoce allá de su época en Vietnam.

translation.en: You're way out of line, Wong.
l like it.
If you men could find Laura Shapiro and pin it on Ko,
translation.es: Si pudieren encontrar a Laura Shapiro y achacárselo a Ko,

translation.en: you might just be able to shut off the largest heroin pipeline to ever come out of the Orient.
translation.es: podrían cortar la ruta más grande de heroína que ha venido de Oriente.

translation.en: Okay, we got nothing to lose.
translation.es: De acuerdo, no tenemos nada que perder.

translation.en: Why don't you two men go to Hong Kong as special advisors to the local police
translation.es: Por qué no se van a Hong Kong, como asesores especiales de la policía local,

translation.en: and see what you can come up with.
Yes, sir.
See you, Captain.
Thank you, Captain.
Thank you.
Here's the keys to that jeep you asked for.  Oh, thank you.
- You sure you don't want a driver? - No, we're okay.
Thanks for getting this through customs for us, Inspector. We really appreciate it.
translation.es: Gracias por pasar esto por la Aduana, inspector.

translation.en: Superintendent Whitehead will meet you tomorrow afternoon at four.
translation.es: El Superintendente los recibirá mañana a las 16h.

translation.en: - You got it, Billy? - Oh, yeah, thanks. See you tomorrow.
- Thanks a lot, Inspector. - Night.
Sleep well.
Man, you love it, huh?
We could stay at a better place, you know?
translation.es: Podríamos estar en un mejor lugar.

translation.en: We're on an expense account.
Nostalgia, Billy, my boy. Nostalgia.
Memories of magic nights on R & R.
translation.es: Recuerdos de las noches mágicas mientras relajábamos.

translation.en: I remember during Nam,
translation.es: Me acuerdo que durante la guerra,

translation.en: there was nothing around here but a bunch of horny grunts, you know?
translation.es: aquí no había nada sino gruñidos cachondos.

translation.en: And the women, Billy.
Oh, the women, mother me.
And besides, nobody's gonna look for us in a dump like this.
translation.es: Y además, nadie nos buscará en este basurero.

translation.en: What's that? An old Chinese coin.
A friend of mine in Chinatown gave this to me.
translation.es: Me la dio un amigo del Barrio Chino.

translation.en: It's sort of a calling card.
translation.es: Es como una tarjeta de visita.

translation.en: - Oh yeah? - Yeah.
Looks like a bunch of shit to me.
I still say it's ludicrous.
The idea that anyone could smuggle a girl into Hong Kong
translation.es: La idea de que alguien pueda contrabandear a una chica acá

translation.en: without my office knowing about it is simply impossible.
translation.es: sin que lo supiéramos me parece imposible.

translation.en: Improbable, not impossible.
Now, listen to me, you two.
I spoke to your captain and he told me about your Dodge City tactics.
translation.es: hablé con su Capitán y me contó de sus tácticas del Lejano Oeste.

translation.en: We don't appreciate people like you in Hong Kong.
translation.es: En Hong Kong no nos gusta gente como ustedes.

translation.en: l want you to assure me that you'll behave with the utmost discretion.
translation.es: Quiero que me aseguren que se comportarán con discreción.

translation.en: Discretion is my middle name, sir.
translation.es: Discreción es mi segundo nombre, señor.

translation.en: Show them out, Inspector.
Yes, sir.
Thank you, sir.
Gentlemen, you must forgive the superintendent.
translation.es: Caballeros, tienen que perdonar al superintendente.

translation.en: He's been trying to nab Ko for years.
translation.es: Está tratando de atrapar a Ko hace años.

translation.en: Considers it a personal mission in life.
I think he's worried you will succeed where he has failed all these years.
translation.es: Debe estar preocupado que lo atrapen, ya que él no pudo.

translation.en: Don't worry about it, Inspector. I'm used to pissing off superiors.
translation.es: No se preocupe. Estoy acostumbrado a cabrearlos.

translation.en: We ran down the phone number you gave us.
Shanghai Massage Parlor.
That's where Benny Garucci called from New York.
translation.es: Ahí es donde Benny Garucci llamó.

translation.en: Apparently, it's a rough place.
translation.es: Parece que es un lugar complicado.

translation.en: They, uh, don't necessarily specialize in giving massages, if you know what l mean.
translation.es: No se especializan en dar masajes, no sé si me explico.

translation.en: You bet your ass I do.
Let's check this place out. Maybe we can shake Ko's tree a little.
translation.es: Vámonos allá. Quizás molestamos un poco a Ko.

translation.en: Billy, you're a mind reader.
You two be careful.
One of the reasons Ko has managed to stay out of prison for so long
translation.es: Una de las razones por las que Ko ha logrado mantenerse libre,

translation.en: is he doesn't mind killing anyone who threatens him.
translation.es: es que no le importa matar a quiénes lo amenacen.

translation.en: If he thinks you're getting too close to finding Laura Shapiro,
translation.es: Si cree que se están acercando demasiado a la chica,

translation.en: your names will be on the lips of every assassin in Hong Kong.
translation.es: cada asesino de Hong Kong estarán detrás de ustedes.

translation.en: It's a friendly little town you got here, Inspector.
Welcome to Hong Kong.
This is my favorite part of town, Billy.
translation.es: Esta es mi parte favorita de la ciudad.

translation.en: We're supposed to be working here.
You know what they say, All work, no play.
translation.es: No todo es trabajo en la vida.

translation.en: Play around here can get us killed.
Whoops. Sorry.
At least you'd die with a smile on your face.
translation.es: Al menos morirías con una sonrisa.

translation.en: Welcome, gentlemen. First time here?
We're just a couple of poor lost souls from New York.
translation.es: Solo somos un par de pobres almas perdidas de Nueva York.

translation.en: A good friend of ours recommended this place very highly.
translation.es: Un buen amigo nos recomendó mucho este lugar.

translation.en: We have many friends in New York.
translation.es: Tenemos muchos amigos en Nueva York.

translation.en: Maybe you remember our friend. His name's Benny Garucci.
translation.es: Tal vez se acuerde de nuestro amigo se llama Benny Garucci.

translation.en: Yeah, Benny Garucci. Benny Garucci, he really loves this place.
translation.es: Sí, a Benny Garucci, le encanta este lugar.

translation.en: He talks about it all the time.
- Right, Billy? - Right.
So sorry, we... we have so many friends. I can't remember them all.
translation.es: Lo siento, tenemos tantos amigos que no recuerdo a todos.

translation.en: But I'm sure we can make your visit here very exciting.
translation.es: Pero estoy segura de que su visita aquí será muy emocionante.

translation.en: Follow, please.
All right.
Hey.
Keep your eyes open.
Don't worry, Billy boy. l wouldn't miss this for the world.
translation.es: No te preocupes, no perdería esto por nada.

translation.en: Billy, don't let this guy sneak up on me.
translation.es: No dejes que ese tipo se me pase la mano.

translation.en: Hey, Garoni?
I'm gonna get you.
You know, you're very pretty.
My goodness gracious. What do we got here?
Billy. Yeah.
Thank you.
Billy, look at this, huh?
Whichever one you want is yours, Billy, huh?
translation.es: Cualquiera que elijas es tuya, Billy.

translation.en: - Okay, hello. - You made the wrong choice.
That's... I'm in love, this is mine.
I'm your friend, you gotta take care of your friends, don't you?
translation.es: Soy tu amigo, tienes que velar por tus amigos.

translation.en: Come on, little baby.
Excuse me.
So...
Phone- in the other girl, okay.
Go ahead, make the phone call.
l remember these holes when they were a little smaller, you know?
translation.es: Me acuerdo de estos agujeros cuando eran más chicos.

translation.en: What do we got here?
Welcome to. Welcome to.
This chick loves me.
You love my clothes?
I love your clothes.
You remind me of someone I knew in Saigon.
translation.es: Me haces acordar a alguien en Saigón.

translation.en: Oh, you know Saigon.
You're very beautiful, really.
No, you are.
How old are you?
Eighteen? You guess.
Excuse me.
Yes.
She really knows a way to a man's heart.
translation.es: Ella sabe cómo llegar al corazón de un hombre.

translation.en: When did you grow a beard?
Oh! Oh, yes.
What the hell?
Shit!
Oh! Damn it! You punk!
Drop it, motherfucker!
No, you drop it.
Motherfucker.
Oh, shit, what the fuck is going on here, huh?
Dress them and take them to my office.
translation.es: Vístanlos y llévenlos a mi oficina.

translation.en: l wanna talk to them before we kill them.
translation.es: Quiero hablar con ellos, antes de matarlos.

translation.en: Hey!
A guy can't take a bath in peace?
Why did Shapiro send you? Shapiro?
- Hey, wait a minute. - l think you know why he sent us.
translation.es: -Espere un momento. -Creo que sabe el porqué.

translation.en: Oh, Shapiro?
Oh, sure, he's very angry at you people, very angry.
translation.es: Claro, está muy enojado con ustedes, muy enojado.

translation.en: Shapiro's angry at us?
That's right, yeah.
But he's the one who--
Don't say anything! These men are New York cop.
translation.es: -Pero fue él... -¡No digas nada! Son policías de Nueva York.

translation.en: - Cops? - Cops?
l am not a cop, I'm a tourist.
translation.es: Yo no soy poli, soy un turista.

translation.en: - Maybe he's a cop. You a cop? - Do I look like a cop?
He doesn't look like a cop.
Take 'em out.
Kill 'em.
Tell Harold Ko we're in town.
translation.es: Dile a Ko que estamos en la ciudad.

translation.en: His days are numbered.
It's never wise to make threats, my young friend.
translation.es: Nunca es aconsejable hacer amenazas, mi amigo.

translation.en: Especially, ones you can't keep.
translation.es: Especialmente las que no puede cumplir.

translation.en: That's not a threat. That's a promise.
translation.es: Esa no es una amenaza, es una promesa.

translation.en: Let's go.
Whatever you say, partner.
Well, you're calling the shots, Billy. What do we do next, huh?
translation.es: Bueno, tú mandas, Billy. ¿Ahora qué hacemos?

translation.en: Here.
What is it with this coin?
Tomorrow we're going to cash this in.
If we use it right, it may tell us everything we want to know about Mr. Ko.
translation.es: Si la usamos correctamente, podrá decirnos lo que queremos acerca del Sr. Ko.

translation.en: This Lee Hing, is he an informer?
translation.es: Ese tal Lee Hing, ¿es un informante?

translation.en: He used to be.
He's retired, but he's still tapped into the whole Hong Kong underworld.
translation.es: Se jubiló, pero aún tiene contactos con el hampa de Hong Kong.

translation.en: Well, what makes you think he'll help us?
translation.es: ¿Y qué te hace pensar que nos ayudará?

translation.en: He may not, but do you have anything better to do today?
translation.es: No lo sé, ¿tienes algo mejor que hacer hoy?

translation.en: Well, as a matter of fact, l could probably think of something.
translation.es: La verdad que podría pensar en algo.

translation.en: What happened to your eye?
It's swollen, l think something bit me.
translation.es: Está hinchado, creo que algo me picó.

translation.en: You better watch out for Hong Kong mosquito wearing high heels.
translation.es: Cuidate de los mosquitos de Hong Kong, suelen usar tacones.

translation.en: Hey, that's the Jumbo Restaurant!
translation.es: Oye, ese es el Restaurante Jumbo.

translation.en: Boy, do I remember that.
But I don't remember the rest of this new shit.
translation.es: No recuerdo el resto de lo nuevo.

translation.en: It all looks kind of different to me, Billy.
translation.es: Para mí se ve algo diferente, Billy.

translation.en: There's Lee Hing's boat.
translation.es: Allí está el barco de Hing.

translation.en: Looks like our friend's doing okay.
translation.es: Parece que a tu amigo le está yendo bien. DOCAS Y MERCADO

translation.en: I bring you greetings from a friend in New York.
translation.es: Le traigo saludos de un amigo de Nueva York.

translation.en: Who is your friend?
His name is Tin Ho.
Tin Ho is a very old and honorable friend.
translation.es: Tin Ho es un amigo de hace mucho y muy honrado.

translation.en: - Now, Mr. Hing, look, we've just come-- - You are police officers from New York.
translation.es: Sr. Hing, acabamos de llegar... Son policías de Nueva York.

translation.en: You have come here looking for a girl who was kidnapped by Ko.
translation.es: Vinieron buscando a una chica que fue raptada por Ko.

translation.en: Gentlemen, there are no secrets in Hong Kong.
translation.es: Señores, en Hong Kong no existen los secretos.

translation.en: Come, sit and have some tea with me.
translation.es: Vengan, siéntense y tomen un té conmigo.

translation.en: It's the least I can do.
translation.es: Es lo mínimo que puedo hacer,

translation.en: Seeing as how you have come all the way to see me for nothing.
translation.es: teniendo en cuenta que se vinieron hasta acá, en vano.

translation.en: Soo Ling, chá for our guests.
translation.es: Soo Ling, té para nuestros invitados.

translation.en: Why is our trip for nothing?
translation.es: ¿Por qué nuestro viaje fue en vano?

translation.en: Surely, you can help us.
Surely, l could. But I will not.
translation.es: Podría, seguramente, pero no lo haré.

translation.en: My father's retired.
Ahoy, Uncle Hing.
I've got a charter in a few hours. Can I hit you for some supplies?
translation.es: Tengo un flete en unas horas. ¿Quieres algo?

translation.en: On credit, I suppose.
At least I'm consistent.
Hey, how are you doing there, buddy? I got something for you, look at this.
translation.es: ¿Cómo andas, compañero? Tengo algo para ti...

translation.en: Straight from the mainland. There you go.
- Thank you. - You're welcome.
Mr. Hing. If you know anything about where Ko is keeping this girl, you gotta tell us.
translation.es: Sr. Hing, si sabe acerca de donde Ko tiene la chica, tienes que decirnos.

translation.en: My daughter was quite correct.
translation.es: Mi hija estaba en lo cierto.

translation.en: l am retired.
But a man like you must maintain his contacts.
translation.es: Pero un hombre como usted debe tener sus contactos.

translation.en: Could you have them find out for us?
Gentlemen, dealing in information like that is extremely dangerous.
translation.es: Señores, manejar una información como esa es extremadamente peligroso.

translation.en: Especially, when it involves people like Harold Ko.
translation.es: En especial cuando se trata de gente como Harold Ko.

translation.en: Listen, if there's something you're not telling us, we can take you in
translation.es: Si hay algo que no está diciendo, podemos llevarlo para hablar con la policía.

translation.en: and let the local cops deal with you.
translation.es: podemos llevarlo para hablar con la policía.

translation.en: Are these men bothering you, sir?
That is not necessary, Stan.
These gentlemen are simply tired and frustrated.
translation.es: Estos caballeros simplemente están cansados y frustrados.

translation.en: Forgive them.
They are dangerous, Father. Make them leave before they bring trouble.
translation.es: Ellos son peligrosos. Échales antes de que traigan problemas.

translation.en: Don't look now, but I think they already have.
translation.es: Bueno, creo que ya lo hicieron.

translation.en: Damn it, they must have followed us, Billy.
No.
You're gonna take me to Ko right now, asshole.
translation.es: Me llevarás de inmediato a lo de Ko, imbécil.

translation.en: Shit!
You see? You see the trouble you cause? Why wouldn't you leave us alone?
translation.es: ¿Ves los problemas que causas? -¿Por qué no nos dejan en paz? -Déjame en paz.

translation.en: Hey, give me a break.
translation.es: -¿Por qué no nos dejan en paz? -Déjame en paz.

translation.en: Tin Ho has asked a favor of me.
translation.es: Tin Ho me pidió un favor.

translation.en: l must honor it.
Do you think that's wise, Uncle?
Maybe not.
But sometimes honor is not wise.
translation.es: Pero a veces el honor no es sabio.

translation.en: Can you tell me where Ko's holding Laura Shapiro?
translation.es: ¿Puede decirme dónde Ko tiene a Laura Shapiro?

translation.en: Not yet, but my friends will know.
translation.es: Aún no, pero mis amigos lo sabrán.

translation.en: Do you have a picture of the girl?
Right here.
Come back here tomorrow.
Stan will know where to find me.
Well, thanks, we really appreciate it.
Thanks.
What the fuck is this?
Who's this?
I hope we can say I'm a friend.
translation.es: Espero que podamos decir que soy un amigo.

translation.en: Listen, you creep.
translation.es: Mira, porquería, no es tu dinero lo que queremos,

translation.en: It's not your money we want, it's your ass.
translation.es: Mira, porquería, no es tu dinero lo que queremos, es tu trasero.

translation.en: I'm sorry to hear that. Goodbye, Mr. Wong.
translation.es: Siento escuchar eso. Adiós, Sr. Wong.

translation.en: - Danny. -
Holy shit, Garoni!
Get the window, Billy, I got downstairs.
translation.es: Ve a la ventana, yo iré abajo.

translation.en: You fools failed.
Sit down.
l spoke to your captain again.
translation.es: Volví a hablar con su Capitán,

translation.en: He assured me that a machine gun is most definitely not standard issue
translation.es: y me aseguró que esa ametralladora, obviamente no es común para los policías de allá.

translation.en: to New York City police.
translation.es: obviamente no es común para los policías de allá.

translation.en: I never go anywhere in Southeast Asia without an Uzi.
translation.es: No voy a ninguna parte del sudeste de Asia sin una Uzi.

translation.en: Do you know what this is?
This is an initial estimate of the damage you caused.
translation.es: Es la estimación inicial del daño que causaron.

translation.en: Look, at least we know we're getting close to Ko.
translation.es: Mire, al menos sabemos que nos estamos acercando a Ko.

translation.en: Otherwise, he wouldn't have tried to wipe us out like that.
translation.es: Si no, no hubiera intentado matarnos.

translation.en: Oh, you have evidence that Ko is behind the attack?
translation.es: ¿Tienen pruebas de que Ko los atacó?

translation.en: Jolly good, let's see it then.
I think it's obvious, don't you?
You want to know what kind of reputation Harold Ko has in Hong Kong?
translation.es: ¿Quieren saber qué reputación tiene Ko aquí?

translation.en: Read that!
He spent three million American dollars to purchase that horse.
translation.es: Gastó tres millones de dólares para comprar ese caballo.

translation.en: And he's holding a press conference this afternoon
translation.es: Y esta tarde hará una conferencia de prensa,

translation.en: to announce that all its race winnings will be donated to the Colony's Orphan Fund.
translation.es: y anunciará que lo que gane con él, donará a los huérfanos.

translation.en: He's a real fucking peach.
I'm warning you two.
I've already wired your commissioner to ask him to take you off this case.
translation.es: Ya le llamé a su comisionado, pidiéndole que los saque del caso.

translation.en: If I have to set eyes on you again, there'll be bloody hell to pay!
translation.es: ¡Si vuelvo a verlos otra vez, estarán jodidos!

translation.en: - Can we go now? - Get the hell out of here!
This Whitehead's a real schmuck.
So, what are we gonna do next, Billy?  There's still Lee Hing.
translation.es: -¿Qué haremos ahora, Billy? -Aún queda Lee Hing.

translation.en: Let's hope he comes up with something.
ln the meantime, do you like horses?
I love horses.
Ladies and gentlemen, as you all know, Stolen Fortune,
translation.es: Damas y caballeros, como todos ustedes saben, Fortuna Robada,

translation.en: the most successful horse of all time,
translation.es: el caballo más exitoso de todos los tiempos,

translation.en: sired only one son before he was killed in a tragic fire.
translation.es: engendró un solo hijo antes de morir en un trágico incendio.

translation.en: The son, Breakaway Threat, was the horse they said no one could buy.
translation.es: El hijo, Amenaza Separatista, decían que era el caballo que nadie podría comprar.

translation.en: They were wrong.
Thank you.
It's my pleasure to present my latest acquisition...
translation.es: Tengo el placer de presentar mi más reciente adquisición,

translation.en: Breakaway Threat, to the people of Hong Kong.
translation.es: Amenaza Separatista, al pueblo de Hong Kong.

translation.en: Mr. Ko, how much money do you think Breakaway Threat
translation.es: Sr. Ko, ¿cuánto dinero cree que Amenaza Separatista podrá ganar para los huérfanos?

translation.en: will be able to earn for the Orphan Fund?
translation.es: Amenaza Separatista podrá ganar para los huérfanos?

translation.en: We hope to donate almost two million dollars
translation.es: Esperamos donar cerca de dos millones de dólares,

translation.en: by the end of the next racing season.
translation.es: hasta el final de la próxima temporada de carreras.

translation.en: Mr. Ko, how soon will Breakaway Threat be able to race?
translation.es: Sr. Ko, ¿cuándo Amenaza Separatista estará listo para correr?

translation.en: Breakaway Threat will be running one week from Saturday.
translation.es: Amenaza Separatista correrá dentro de una semana, a partir del sábado.

translation.en: Hey, Ko.
You left your briefcase in our hotel room.
translation.es: Olvidaste tu maletín en nuestra habitación.

translation.en: I think you are mistaken, sir.
Well, if this isn't your briefcase,
translation.es: Bueno, si este no es tu maletín,

translation.en: then this isn't your money either.
translation.es: entonces este tampoco es tu dinero.

translation.en: I don't think this guy Ko likes you, Billy.
translation.es: No creo que le agrades a este Ko, Billy.

translation.en: That's too bad.  Are you surprised to see Garucci here?
Not really. Right now, we have more important business to take care of.
translation.es: No, pero ahora tenemos cosas más importantes que hacer.

translation.en: You follow Garucci. I'll go see what Lee Hing's dug up.
translation.es: Tú sigue a Garucci. Iré a ver qué descubrió Lee Hing.

translation.en: Whatever you say, kid.
If your father can help us,
translation.es: Si tu padre nos ayuda, podemos arrestar a

translation.en: we can shut down one of the worst criminals in the world.
translation.es: Si tu padre nos ayuda, podemos arrestar a uno de los peores criminales del mundo.

translation.en: There's no dishonor in that.
Everything will be fine, you'll see.
translation.es: Todo estará bien, ya lo verás.

translation.en: Cove ahead.
Oh, shit.
No!
Oh, no.
Father! Father!
No!
Too late now.
Billy, for Christ's sake, keep her back!
Soo Ling!
No. No! No! No!
You. You're the cause of this.
You killed my father!
No, l didn't kill your father.
translation.es: Yo no maté a tu padre.

translation.en: Harold Ko killed your father.
translation.es: Harold Ko mató a tu padre.

translation.en: I hate you! I hate you!
If you hate me, then you must hate Ko.
translation.es: Si me odias, entonces debes odiar a Ko.

translation.en: Help me find him.
Help me destroy the man who killed your father.
translation.es: Ayúdame a destruir al hombre que mató a tu padre.

translation.en: Father!
My father told me to help you.
translation.es: Mi padre me pidió que te ayude.

translation.en: Even though he's dead, I must obey.
translation.es: Y aunque esté muerto, debo obedecerle.

translation.en: The fortune- teller was a friend of my father's.
translation.es: El adivino era amigo de mi padre.

translation.en: If my father found out anything, the fortune- teller will know.
translation.es: Si mi padre descubrió algo, lo sabrá el adivino.

translation.en: You look for a girl that was taken from New York by Mr. Ko.
translation.es: Buscas a una chica que fue raptada de Nueva York por el Sr. Ko.

translation.en: How do you know?
The I Ching tells all.
Nothing is hidden.
There has been war.
Between Ko and Shapiro?
Yes, but the war is over.
translation.es: Sí, pero la guerra se terminó.

translation.en: A man has come across the water to make peace.
translation.es: Un hombre ha cruzado las aguas para hacer la paz.

translation.en: Benny Garucci.
Yes.
My people tell me a pact will be made tomorrow night.
translation.es: Mi gente me dice que mañana por la noche se sellará un pacto

translation.en: And the girl will be returned.
Where's the girl? I do not know.
But you must not look for her.
The I Ching is not good.
translation.es: El I Ching no es bueno.

translation.en: I see only danger...
death, and betrayal.
Thanks.
Wait a minute.
l must say a prayer for my father and consult the I Ching.
translation.es: Debo rezar una oración por mi padre, y consultar al I Ching.

translation.en: What do your sticks say? Is the fortune- teller right?
translation.es: ¿Qué dicen tus palitos? ¿Está en lo cierto el adivino?

translation.en: I ask the questions, Billy. But I never read the answers.
translation.es: Yo hago las preguntas, pero jamás leo las respuestas.

translation.en: l trust you found the girl, well?
Yes, sir, just as you promised.
translation.es: Sí, señor, como usted lo prometió.

translation.en: When Mr. Shapiro refused to pay for my last shipment, l lost much face.
translation.es: Cuando el Sr. Shapiro se negó a pagar el último embarque, me sentí humillado.

translation.en: l trust it will never happen again.
translation.es: Confío que eso no volverá a suceder.

translation.en: It was a simple misunderstanding, sir.
Be assured that Mr. Shapiro remains your faithful friend and partner.
translation.es: Le aseguro que el Sr. Shapiro sigue siendo su fiel amigo y socio.

translation.en: He wishes no ill feeling towards you.
translation.es: Él no le desea ningún mal.

translation.en: I'm glad to hear this.
But Mr. Shapiro is worried.
translation.es: Pero el Sr. Shapiro está preocupado.

translation.en: Those two cops from New York, they're getting too close to our operation.
translation.es: Esos dos polis de Nueva York, se están acercando a nuestra operación.

translation.en: Calm your fears.
The girl should be returned to you tonight.
translation.es: La chica deberá volver esta noche contigo.

translation.en: As for those two police officers,
translation.es: En cuanto a esos dos policías,

translation.en: they cause me great dishonor.
translation.es: ellos me causaron un gran deshonor.

translation.en: They will be taken care of.
Garucci went to this big container shipyard before he went to see Ko.
translation.es: Garucci fue hasta un gran patio con contenedores antes de irse junto a Ko.

translation.en: Now, it's my guess he was checking on the girl
translation.es: Pienso que se fue a ver a la chica,

translation.en: before arranging an exchange with the big man.
translation.es: antes de arreglar el cambio con el gran jefe.

translation.en: The fortune- teller said the exchange will be made tonight.
translation.es: El adivino dijo que el cambio sería esta noche.

translation.en: So, we have to break in and get the girl out before that can happen.
translation.es: Así que tenemos que entrar y llevar a la chica antes que suceda.

translation.en: Tall order, man.
The rumors I hear say the place is Ko's drug factory.
translation.es: Escuché por ahí que es una fábrica de droga de Ko.

translation.en: It will be heavily guarded.
Maybe we should call Whitehead, Billy.
Hold it. We're not sure it's the drug factory.
translation.es: No estamos seguros que sea una fábrica de drogas.

translation.en: We're not sure Laura Shapiro's there.
translation.es: No estamos seguros que ella está ahí.

translation.en: If we're wrong, Whitehead will ship us home.
translation.es: Si no está, Whitehead nos enviará a casa.

translation.en: l will go with you.
That's a great idea.
l can handle myself in a fight.
We know you can, Soo Ling. But someone has to stay behind just in case we're caught.
translation.es: Lo sabemos, pero alguien tiene que quedarse por si nos atrapan.

translation.en: That's your job.
He's right, honey.
Now, if you don't hear from us three hours after we hit the place,
translation.es: Si no entramos en contacto tres horas después de que entramos,

translation.en: you call Whitehead, understand? Call.
Don't worry, Soo Ling, I'll go with them.
translation.es: No te preocupes, iré con ellos.

translation.en: You have experience in this kind of things?
Yeah, you might say that.
Seals, US Navy.
As a matter of fact, I just happen to have some of my old gear with me.
translation.es: De hecho, por casualidad traje mi viejo equipo.

translation.en: It might just come in handy.
What the fuck is that?
I got that from an Israeli friend of mine.
translation.es: Me lo dio un amigo israelí.

translation.en: That's a portable, six- shot, 20- millimeter cannon.
translation.es: Es un cañón portátil de 20 mm, de seis tiros.

translation.en: I'll be a son of a bitch.
I ain't never seen anything like that.
translation.es: Jamás vi algo así. ¿Tú sí, Billy?

translation.en: - Have you, Billy? - No.
translation.es: Jamás vi algo así. ¿Tú sí, Billy? No.

translation.en: The entrance is about four containers in. It's a gray door.
translation.es: Después de cuatro contenedores es la entrada, una puerta gris.

translation.en: About four containers on top of that there's an air duct connected to an air conditioner. That's how we go in.
translation.es: Arriba hay un ducto de aire conectado a un aire acondicionado, ahí entraremos.

translation.en: - All right? - All right.
- Let's do it. - Okay.
Okay, all signed out.
You wait here. I'll bring down Laura Shapiro.
translation.es: Espere aquí. Yo bajaré a Laura Shapiro.

translation.en: She better be all right.
translation.es: Más te vale que esté bien.

translation.en: Ah.
I'll go first.
I'll be right behind you, Billy boy. You got my back, Jones?
- I got it. - All right, let's go.
Okay.
translation.es: Hace mucho calor, mira si el aire está prendido.

translation.en: Drop your guns.
Billy! Billy!
Billy.
I told you the Japanese make great bulletproof vests.
translation.es: Te dije que los japoneses hacen excelentes chalecos antibalas.

translation.en: Let's get those fuckers!
Everybody out! Come on, move out of this joint, let' s go!
- Come on, let's move it! - Out!
- - Am I talking to myself here? Go!
- Come on, let's go! - Let's move! Let's go!
Hold it! - Up! Up! Up! - What happened?
Don't you understand English, guy.
- The guard has the key. - Give me the key
- or I'll blow your dick off! - Key, key! Come on!
Key! Key!
What's the matter, you never seen four naked broads before? Let's go!
- Go! -
- Good to see you again, Laura. - Yeah. Hell of a way to get a date.
translation.es: Me alegro de verte. -¡Qué linda cita! -Muy gracioso.

translation.en: That's very funny.
Got it?
The other one!
- What the fuck's going on? - They're gonna blow the lab up.
translation.es: -¿Qué está pasando? -Van a volar el laboratorio.

translation.en: - Got it? You got it? - Go. Okay.
- You got it, almost ready? - Yeah.
Come on, kid, let's go, we're on a count!
- Yeah, I'm ready. - Let's go!
- With me? - Yes, sir.
This sucker's got keys. Come on, let's roll it.
translation.es: Ese boludo tiene las llaves, vámonos.

translation.en: Let's get the--
Where's Laura Shapiro?
The man asked you a question.
translation.es: El hombre te hizo una pregunta.

translation.en: Fuck you.
Surely, you know we can make you talk.
translation.es: Seguramente sabes que podemos hacerte hablar.

translation.en: l got news for you Ko.
You're finished, you're already dead and you don't know it yet.
translation.es: estás acabado, estás casi muerto pero aún no lo sabes.

translation.en: This is all so unnecessary.
Enjoy yourself, Benny.
Hello?
This is Billy Wong. You've got a problem, Ko.
translation.es: Te habla Billy Wong. Tienes un problema, Ko.

translation.en: I've got a problem?
If you don't give me Garoni, I'm not releasing Laura Shapiro to anyone.
translation.es: Si no me das a Garoni, no le entrego a Laura Shapiro a nadie.

translation.en: If you kill Garoni, she disappears.
translation.es: Si matas a Garoni, ella desaparece.

translation.en: I'm surprised.
l had no idea your partner's life meant so much to you.
translation.es: No tenía idea que la vida de tu compañero significara tanto para ti.

translation.en: I believe we can do business, Mr. Wong.
translation.es: Creo que podemos hacer negocio, Sr. Wong.

translation.en: Shall we say, in my shipping yard?
In two hours.
I'll be there.
Stan will take you to Whitehead.
He will get you home.
Look, I don't mind staying in hiding until you can get Garoni back.
translation.es: No me importa quedarme escondida hasta que recuperes a Garoni.

translation.en: That's okay.
Get Laura to Whitehead.
Tell him to have as many men as possible at Ko's shipyard at exactly 7:00 a.m.
translation.es: Dile que lleve lo máximo de hombres posible, al astillero de Ko a las 7h en punto.

translation.en: If he's late, there's gonna be lots of dead bodies to pick up.
translation.es: Si llega tarde, tendrá que recolectar un montón de cadáveres.

translation.en: You're not going in there alone, are you?
Yeah, this is between me, Benny Garucci, and Harold Ko.
translation.es: Sí, esto es entre Benny Garucci, Harold Ko y yo.

translation.en: Mr. Wong.
How nice to see you.
Where's Garoni?
Where's Laura Shapiro?
My partner first.
But, of course.
You bastard.
I've lived up to my part of the bargain, Mr. Wong.
translation.es: Yo cumplí mi parte del trato, Sr. Wong.

translation.en: Now, where is the girl? She's safe.
translation.es: -Ahora, ¿dónde está la chica? -Ella está a salvo.

translation.en: She certainly is.
Whitehead.
l warned you, Wong.
Mr. Ko is a very influential man in Hong Kong.
translation.es: El Sr. Ko es un hombre muy influyente en Hong Kong.

translation.en: You son of a bitch.
Oh, yes, but a well- paid one.
translation.es: Sí, pero uno muy bien pago.

translation.en: Well, it seems that this affair will come to a happy ending after all.
translation.es: Bueno, parece que este negocio, después de todo, llegará a un final feliz.

translation.en: There only remains one last piece of entertainment.
translation.es: Solo queda un último acto de entretenimiento.

translation.en: Come on, big boy.
You son of a bitch!
Come on.
Bill.
Soo Ling, you help Laura, I'll take care of Garoni.
translation.es: Ayuda a Laura, me encargaré de Garoni.

translation.en: Going somewhere, Superintendent?
Start the engine. Start the engine.
Go! Stop him. Stop him!
Get me out of here.
No.
Run him down!
Shit.
Jesus Christ.
Give me that fucking thing.
Give it to me, come on.
Come on!
In recognition of service above and beyond the call of duty,
translation.es: En reconocimiento de servicios, por encima y más allá de sus obligaciones,

translation.en: which resulted in the forfeiture of over 2,000 pounds of illicit drugs
translation.es: que culminó con el decomiso de casi una tonelada de drogas ilícitas,

translation.en: en route from Hong Kong to New York,
translation.es: en ruta de Hong Kong a Nueva York,

translation.en: the Police Department of the City of New York
translation.es: el Departamento de Policía de Nueva York,

translation.en: is proud to bestow it's departmental Medal of Honor
translation.es: se enorgullece de otorgar su Medalla de Honor departamental,

translation.en: on officers Wong and Garoni.
translation.es: a los oficiales Wong y Garoni.

translation.en: Thanks, Captain. It's good to be home.
translation.es: Gracias, Capitán, es bueno volver a casa.

translation.en: What's our next assignment, Cap? Crowd control.
translation.es: -¿Cuál es nuestra próxima misión? -Control de multitudes.

translation.en: Congratulations.
- Well done, Garoni. - Thank you, sir.
translation.es: Bien hecho, Garoni. Gracias, señor. Gracias, Sr. Alcalde.

translation.en: Thank you, Mr. Mayor.
♪ When we tear up the town ♪
